Test navigator.language and navigator.languages in insecure context.

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".

FAIL navigator.language should be en-US. Was .
FAIL navigator.languages.length should be 1. Was 0.
FAIL navigator.languages[0] should be en-US (of type string). Was undefined (of type undefined).
PASS successfullyParsed is true

TEST COMPLETE
